Many words in [PIE](PIE) and Semitic are suffixed and prefixed with [ma](ma.html) (suffixed especially in greek).  


**Ï€Î¿Î¹Î­** poie faire see-to [make](make)  
Ï€Î¿Î¯Î·Î¼Î± a thing made  
Î¶á¿³Î¿Ï€Î¿Î¹Î­  

-Î¼Î±Ï„Î¯Î¶ zb Mathematik, Pragmatik -Ï„Î¯Î¶ -tik  

The ubiquitous suffix [ğ“®](ğ“®.html) is represented in arabic Ø§Ù„ Il corresponds to **an** article  
The ubiquitous suffix [ğ“®](ğ“®.html) is represented in sumeric [min](min.html) [men](men.html)
